forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 33C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High 92F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 14C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 57F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 32C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 89F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 13C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 56F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 25C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 77F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low around 10C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low near 50F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 22C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 72F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 47F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 19C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 64F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low near 45F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 17C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 63F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 8C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 46F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 21C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 69F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 49F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 19C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 66F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 44F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 64F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening with some clearing overnight. Low 6C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 43F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with some showers in the afternoon. High 19C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy in the morning then periods of showers later in the day. High around 65F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low around 45F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
